DamageResistances: Psychic, Force, Radiant, Bludgeoning, Slashing, and Piercing from non-magical weapons

Traits.Name: Null Field
Traits.Content: Creates an aura with a 10 ft. radius that suppresses spells, psionics, and supernatural abilities, rendering magical effects unusable within its range.

Traits.Name: Adaptive Shielding
Traits.Content: When taking damage from spells or magical effects, the Nullifier gains resistance to that damage type until the start of its next turn.

Actions.Name: Disruption Beam
Actions.Content: Ranged Spell Attack: +9 to hit, range 60/120 ft. On hit: 27 (3d10) radiant damage and the target gains the Suppressed condition until the end of its next turn, preventing the use of reactions or bonus actions fueled by supernatural power.

Actions.Name: Overload Pulse
Actions.Content: Burst Attack: The Nullifier emits a destructive wave in a 30-ft. radius as an action. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failure, they take 40 (4d10) force damage and are stunned until the end of their next turn. On a success, they take half damage and are not stunned.

LegendaryActions.Name: Suppressive Step
LegendaryActions.Content: Moves up to half speed without provoking.

LegendaryActions.Name: Lockdown Scan
LegendaryActions.Content: One creature in 30 ft. must succeed Wis save DC 18 or have its speed halved and attacks at disadvantage until start of its next turn.

LegendaryActions.Name: Overclock Pulse (Costs 2)
LegendaryActions.Content: Triggers Null Field surge: all creatures in aura must succeed Con save DC 18 or gain 1 level of exhaustion until the end of combat (suppression fatigue).

LairActions.Name: Power Drain
LairActions.Content: A random magical item in the area goes inert until the next round.

LairActions.Name: Resonance Collapse
LairActions.Content: Suppression field expands another 20 ft. until end of round
